briefTitle: Radiomic Analysis for Predicting Treatment Response and Clinical Outcomes in Malignancies
officialTitle: Radiomic Analysis of CT and MRI Scans for Predicting Treatment Response and Clinical Outcomes in Patients With Breast, Brain, Head-neck and Gynecological Malignancies
conditions: Breast Cancer, Head and Neck Cancer, Brain Cancer, Gynecologic Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Development of imaging biomarkers in predicting treatment response for breast, brain, head-neck, and gynecological malignancies
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast, head and neck, brain, and gynecological malignancies
* Treated with radiation at Odette Cancer Centre between 2010 and 2019

Exclusion Criteria:

* N/A
